titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the meeting of Protestant dissenters called Quakers in Turners-Hall, London, on the 16th of the second month, 1696 : being the publick day of thanksgiving for the deliverance of the King and Kingdom : to which is added a testimony ... to King William the III from the aforesaid people ... / by George Keith.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
